name: Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench with your feet firmly on the ground. Grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower it to your mid-chest, keeping your elbows at a 45-degree angle. Press back up to the starting position.

name: Incline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on an incline bench, feet flat on the floor. Grip the bar slightly wider than shoulder-width. Lower it to your upper chest, then press back up.

name: Decline Barbell Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a decline bench, securing your feet. Grip the barbell wider than shoulder-width. Lower it to your lower chest, then press back up.

name: Barbell Deadlift
instructions: Stand with feet hip-width apart, barbell over mid-foot. Grip the bar, bend at the hips, keep back straight. Lift by extending hips and knees.

name: Sumo Deadlift
instructions: Use a wider stance, grip the bar inside your knees. Keep back straight, lift by driving through the legs and hips.

name: Romanian Deadlift
instructions: Hold the barbell at hip level, feet shoulder-width. Hinge at the hips, lower the bar while keeping back straight, return to start.

name: Conventional Squat
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, bar on your upper back. Lower until thighs are parallel to the floor, push back up.

name: Front Squat
instructions: Hold the bar on the front of your shoulders. Lower into a squat while keeping the torso upright, then stand back up.

name: Overhead Squat
instructions: Hold the bar overhead with a wide grip. Keep your core tight as you squat down, maintaining balance, then return to standing.

name: Leg Press
instructions: Sit on the leg press machine. Place feet shoulder-width apart on the platform. Push the weight up, then lower under control.

name: Bulgarian Split Squat
instructions: Stand a few feet in front of a bench. Place one foot on the bench behind you. Lower into a lunge position, then push back up.

name: Lunges
instructions: Stand upright, holding dumbbells. Step forward, lowering your back knee toward the ground. Push back up and repeat.

name: Calf Raise
instructions: Stand on the calf raise machine with toes on the platform. Raise heels as high as possible, then lower back down.

name: Seated Calf Raise
instructions: Sit on the calf raise machine with feet on the platform. Push up onto your toes, then lower back down.

name: Lat Pulldown
instructions: Sit at the lat pulldown machine, grip the bar wider than shoulder-width. Pull the bar down to your chest, then return slowly.

name: Pull-Up
instructions: Grab a pull-up bar with an overhand grip. Pull yourself up until your chin is over the bar, then lower back down.

name: Bent-Over Barbell Row
instructions: Hold the bar with an overhand grip, hinge forward at the hips. Pull the bar to your torso, then lower back down.

name: Dumbbell Row
instructions: Place one knee on a bench, hold a dumbbell in the opposite hand. Pull the weight to your side, then lower.

name: Barbell Curl
instructions: Stand upright, hold a barbell with an underhand grip. Curl the bar up to your shoulders, then lower slowly.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curl
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand. Curl the weights up, squeezing your biceps, then lower back down.

name: Hammer Curl
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing in. Curl the weights up, then lower back down.

name: Triceps Dips
instructions: Grip parallel bars, lower yourself until elbows are at 90 degrees, then push back up.

name: Triceps Pushdown
instructions: Grip the cable attachment, push it down until arms are fully extended, then return slowly.

name: Overhead Triceps Extension
instructions: Hold a dumbbell overhead with both hands. Lower behind your head, then extend back up.

name: Close-Grip Bench Press
instructions: Lie on a flat bench, grip the barbell with hands closer than shoulder-width. Lower to your chest, then press back up.

name: Skull Crushers
instructions: Lie on a bench, hold an EZ bar with an overhand grip. Lower the bar to your forehead, then extend your arms back up.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
instructions: Sit or stand with a dumbbell in each hand at shoulder height. Press the weights overhead, then lower back to the starting position.

name: Barbell Overhead Press
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart, hold a barbell at shoulder height. Press the bar overhead, then lower back down.

name: Arnold Press
instructions: Hold dumbbells at shoulder height with palms facing you. Rotate palms outward as you press the weights overhead, then lower.

name: Lateral Raise
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand at your sides. Raise arms out to the sides until they reach shoulder height, then lower slowly.

name: Front Raise
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand, palms facing your thighs. Lift the weights forward to shoulder height, then lower.

name: Rear Delt Fly
instructions: Bend at the waist, hold dumbbells with palms facing in. Raise arms out to the sides, squeezing shoulder blades together, then lower.

name: Face Pull
instructions: Attach a rope to a cable machine at face height. Pull the rope towards your face, squeezing your shoulder blades together.

name: Cable Lateral Raise
instructions: Stand beside a cable machine, grasp the handle with the opposite hand. Raise arm out to the side, then lower slowly.

name: Seated Dumbbell Shrug
instructions: Sit on a bench holding dumbbells. Shrug your shoulders as high as possible, then lower back down.

name: Barbell Shrug
instructions: Hold a barbell in front of your thighs with an overhand grip. Shrug your shoulders up, then lower back down.

name: Hanging Leg Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar, raise legs straight in front of you to waist height, then lower back down.

name: Decline Sit-Up
instructions: Lie on a decline bench with feet secured. Perform a sit-up by contracting your abs, then lower back down.

name: Russian Twist
instructions: Sit on the ground, hold a medicine ball. Twist your torso side to side, keeping your core engaged.

name: Plank
instructions: Lie face down, rest on forearms and toes. Keep body straight and core engaged, holding the position as long as possible.

name: Side Plank
instructions: Lie on your side, prop up on one forearm. Keep body straight and hold the position for the desired duration.

name: Hanging Knee Raise
instructions: Hang from a pull-up bar, raise knees towards your chest, then lower back down.

name: Reverse Crunch
instructions: Lie on your back, lift legs off the ground. Curl knees towards your chest, then lower back down.

name: Leg Raises
instructions: Lie flat, keep legs straight. Lift them to 90 degrees, then lower slowly.

name: Cable Woodchopper
instructions: Attach a handle to a cable machine at a high setting. Pull the cable diagonally across your body while twisting your torso.

name: Battle Ropes
instructions: Hold battle ropes in each hand. Use quick, alternating arm movements to create waves.

name: Kettlebell Swing
instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Swing the kettlebell between your legs, then drive hips forward to propel it upward.

name: Box Jump
instructions: Stand in front of a box, jump up, landing softly on top, then step down.
